content.detailedDescription: Not real sure of  exact time.But know it was mid to late winter in the gulf of tokin, during the war. we were on patrol doing rectangles, in our grid, at 2/3's speed, about 22-23 knots...About 30 mph. when sonar reported a contact bearing off our starboard side, under water about 200-300 feet. this ufo circled our ship (lenard f. mason, dd-852) call sign stud poker, 3 and 1/2 times.And then dissapeared at a very high speed ? they classified this as a whale...Really? to the best of my knowledge at this time in history, there were no subs that could travel under water at that speed ! let alone circle at sumner class destroyer  doing about 30 mph, i was a radioman (rm3)onboard at this time, so i only know what i heard from radio central....Its hard at this time to remember all the details...I do believe it was late jan. or early fed. at dusk. hope u can link this to some other info you may already have....Tks for listening...Sparky
content.summary: Caught on sonar on the distroyer i was on...(dd-852).  learnard f. mason, circled our ship 31/2 times, and toke off at an 45%'s 2 our bow, we were at 2/3's speed, 21-23 knots. do the math for mph

content.detailedDescription:
The object looked like a lighthouse on its side, but luminous. this occurred in evanston, il many years ago. i never understood it, but there was more to this event. i was fishing with friends or my brother(s), i can't remember. i thought that this object might be a mirage, turned 90 degrees due to some prismatic atmospheric effect, but i didn't really believe that. i only noticed it because i looked up to gauge the time of morning. there may have been a rotating light at the center of the hourglass or cylinder, but i would not swear to it. 

after seeing this object, i dismissed it as some kind of atmospheric anomaly. fishing was poor in the lagoon, so i moved a few hundred feet to the lake michigan side of northwestern campus (near the observatory). 

soon, i saw an area of darker water in lake michigan, it seemed to be about 20 to 25 feet around, and it moved very slowly in a seemingly random fashion. it was about 100 feet from shore. it seemed to me that there were no waves above the dark area, although there were waves everywhere else. i dismissed this as possibly a school of small fish or some visual distortion perhaps caused by water flow into or out of the nearby lagoon. 

the year is approximate, but the memory is as if it happened recently. i wish i could add more, but this is my best account. i have never seen anything similar but have never forgotten this day. i have not shared this experience with anyone.

i was curious and fascinated, there was no sound that i could detect. the first object was no longer there when i looked up again, i don't remember how the second object went away.
content.summary: Looked like an hourglass shape.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter taylor8 along with my wife and stepmotherwere all giing outside. i had stepped out first and my daughter was walking out the door as she was doing so we were facingeast and we both witnessed a turquoise transparent blurry infinity symbol shaped craft fly right over the top of our trees but not as high as a pin oak tree (50-60ft). when we saw it it was as if it was hovering over the house until we noticed it and in a blink of an eye it shot off light a shioting star and turning hard north around the pin oak tree in my father in laws yard. i been living here 8 yrs in this spot and i and my wife and oldest daughter taylor has witnessed multiple ufos the others prior to this was orbs of light like a star perfectly round and about the same height and either had sound . the only difference is the starlike ufo flew over the house slowly and i witnessed it until it went out of sight. (30sec) ive seen it twice within 6 months apart
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was shocking that me and my 8 yr old daughter seen this very strange fast flash! and orbs in other dates me n wife has witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
rearview mirror i think has a reptilian staring back at my camera as i take a pic from my car behind it. i couldnt see the rearview mirror at the time and saw later when i zoomed in on the photo. i was taking a picture of the huge monster logo decal which i had heard in the news a woman claiming it was a symbol for 666. they were goofing on the woman in the story on the howard stern show. i thought it was weird to have a huge logo on your car and then later noticed another set of numbers in the license plate that made me think that maybe that lady wasnt so crazy. 
it's harder to see on the phone, but my laptop shows that ambient glow behind the huge yellow(?) right eye that reminds me of my cats eyes in certain lighting. also i believe i see a glassy highlight of white light reflection on the lower part of the same eyeball. it's almost clearer to me when unedited because the lines aren't pixelated and distorted by the high contrast and i can see the gradients where i would expect them to be on huge eyes. i see the vertical black slits for pupils. and the folds of skin in the right places for the thick heavy eyelids and weird scaly protrusions in the middle of the forehead. finally, the eyes/pupils are where i would expect them to be since they are looking at my hand outside my window holding up my camera. and the alien looks like it's frowning from the mouth turned downward and the forehead area looking twisted from stress.
content.summary: The driver if this car looks to be a reptilian alien as can be seen when this pic is viewed on a laptop. the tinted windows make it difficult to see the details on a small screen. i cant see the face on my phone but i do on my laptop.

content.detailedDescription: Looking at sky we saw few lights in formation and soon they stayed in same spot and in weird shape and at end long straight light of balls and then stopped.
content.summary: Weird lights in sky unknown source

content.detailedDescription:
Around 8:20pm 4/17/15 in jimwells county about 5miles north of alice,tx.  on highway 359. myself and 2 neighbors witnessed some lights not sure how many but we could see them changing directions while the lightning was striking and the duration of what the lightening was leaving was longer than usual. there was a bad storm happening at the same time. thunder, lightning, and light rain was falling during the sighting. light hail followed and the whole time there was a tornado warning in the jim wells are. i live close to a naval landing field and we have always seen activity but just found out about this site. we have had a very close encounter in my backyard one night, had about 7 witnesses and we figured out a way to call them or at least a way of getting their attention. we dont do it often cause its kinds creepy. thank you 






i hope to get some footage when we get their attention because it really works, we got the attention of one light a few years ago and we were in shock on how low the light got it started off as a light in the sky like a star then moved like a satellite and once we got it to come closer it hovered extremely low.We knew it was the same light cause it was taking the same path over n over till it got closer to check us out. it was about 20ft or lower we have very short mesquite trees here so its not hard to see the clear sky and i live about 5mi from the nearest town so i have an amazing view of the sky, my info is up above if u have any questions. there is some crazy things we've seen out here and even heard some sounds coming from the sky kinda like those horns of the apocalypse
content.summary: Bright star like but about the size of a aspirin to me

content.detailedDescription:
January to may 1967, as a very young sailor, i was stationed at a small auxilary bombing range, outside the town of "stumpy point", in dare county nc.  at the range, were three towers about 100 feet high where crews would man to watch as af (from seamore-johnson afb) and navy (from nas oceana and several carriers off the coast) bombers, and fighters would come each night to drop practice bombs.  our job was to give coordinates (triangulate), to determine where the bomb landed.  the area was carved out of the swamps, in the shape of a key, with one tower at each of the three oints.  distance between towers was approximtely one mile. each tower was manned by at least six individuals and the main tower, is where the "night commander", always a senior petty officer,would supervise all of the sailors.

from the main tower looking northward, was a gravel road about 20 feet wide, which went all the way around the swamp, connecting all of the towers, plus a large storage buiding on the far north end of the swamp. the area inside that road, was swamp and a "lake" which was more than ten feet deep.

sometime in march after the last snow of the year, i was in the main tower as the primary observer (with large bioculars mounted on the steel frame of the tower, meaning i was actual outside the tower itself).  after a break, i came inside to warm up  it was exactly 10:45 pm at the time.  i came in and immediately grabbed a bottle of soda from ice chest we always had available.  after i opened the bottle, something caught my eye.  

on the north portion of the road coming from the direction of the storage building, was what appeared to be a military-like tank (with its treads covering the entire road). it was totally flat on top (no turret). first, there were no such vehicles on our base.  secondly, it glowed a pale bluish-white , and was extremely bright..  i immediately called out to every one to look, pointing at the vehicle.  needless to say everyone looked and we were literally in awe at what we were seeing. when the "tank" got to the edge of the road, where it turned to the east , it stopped. and slowly hovered over the water of the swamp, where it changed its shape, into an unusual saucer shape, but totally unusual; it took on a shape that i would describe as a "potato chip". by that i mean its "wings" turned upward, and its tail and nose downward, very similar to the shape of a potato chip!  it had no openings, windows or other protrutions other than it was very thick in the center, as if to have maybe two or three internal levels.  it had no markings that i could see but it did have one heck of a bright (white) light on the bottom-center of it.  

the craft began moving toward the main tower, drifrting over the water at maybe ten feet alitiude, at best, at about maybe five or ten miles per hour (i could only guess).  it was approximately 3/4 of a mile from where we first saw it, to the tower.  when it was about 100 feet or so from the tower, it turned so that the bottom of the vehicle was facing us and rose to the level of the tower, where we were all watching, scaring all of us.  we were all panicy as this beast "stared at us".  i estimate it to have been about 50-to-75 feet in diameter, at least the size of the tower office.  it turned on its light that practically blinded us all, for about what seemed like a few minutes. this part continued below. 

the craft shut off the olight and turned to a level position, and instantly moved to the east tower.  its speed was unbelievable.  it was literally instant!.  it did the same thing to the east tower, and then went to the south tower.  we all watched this going on, and discussed what we saw, totally confused.  suddenly, the craft turned verticle and took off at an outrageous speed, straight up, disappearing from our line of sight, straight up, within less than  ... seconds.  it took off east directly over the pamlico sound toward the atlantic.

at that point, the phone rang, shocking us back to reality.  it was senior chief petty officer, who was livid because no on answeed th phone.  he said he had been calling since 11:00 pm.  we all looked up the wall clock, which read 12:50 am, a variation of more than two hours since the incident happened.  those of us who had wristwatches compared time... everyone had a different time, varying upward of 20 minutes to over an hour.  this royally spooked all of us!

at that point in time, the commander of the base drove up in a military truck, and climbed the stairs ot the tower.  he was extemely peeved, and curse all of us out for our lack of responding to his calls.  when we told him of our experience, he made phone call and within a matter of maybe a minute, four af jests passed over the range, heading east, with full afterburners on, headuiing the direction of the saucer.  we also found out that two carriers at sea, launched air craft, after the saucer. in our minds, it had only been maybe a minute that the saucer left us.

the commander ordered the towers to be closed down, and he took us all (all threeee towers)back to the main barracks, where we were ordered to report to the galley.  no one was allowed to leave the room, except to the toilet, with an armed guard.  

since no police (mp's) were assigned to our base, i have no idea where they came from. there was an entire company of army mp's present, blocking our barracks and several other areas.  sitting across the highway, about 100 feet from the galley was a very large helicopter, and two smaller choppers.

in all there were about20 of us who witnessed the event. all were present in the galley.  we sat there from about 1 am til the sun rose, not allowed to sleep, or leave the area.  each of us called into a room, which had no windows and interrogated by two men.  one was in a suit and never spoke.  the other was an af lieutenant colonel.  sometime around 8am, we were all ushered to the helicopters, and taken to seamore-johnson afb, where we were interrogated as if we were terrorists.  

we were held totally incommunicado, for almost ten days, when i was singled out and sent back to my parent command, at nas oceana.  there, i was taken in handcuffs to my barracks, to pack all my gear, and sent to san diego, in a small business jet, with a guard.  there, i was reassigned to "garbage duty" (which is to say, a job no one wanted). a few months later, i was sent to vietnam. 

this was extemely hard on me, because i was a 20 year old newly weed, forced to leave my wife with her family in virginia.  once in san diego, she flew out to meet me, and would not believe that i was being guarded like common criminal.  i was ordered to speak to no one about the situation, even her.  she didn't believe me, thinking i was having an affair, which almost led to a divorce.  thankfully we worked it out.

in vietnam (on the battlefield!), i was met at our hq by two men in busioness suits, who took me aside, and warned me in no uncertain terms that if i made mention of the inciednt (which was now almost a year behhind me), i would be immeditely transfered to fort leavenworth. suffice it to say, they scared the hell out of me. 

needless to say, almost fifty years has past me by.  i'm now close to 70, and in poor health. what's the navy gonna do now?  put me in jail and pay for all of my medical care?  i doubt it seriously.

now back to the situation at the tower.

the following happened that changed me forever.  it took me years to sort it out and attempt to make sence of .. so much so, that i ended up with some very strange mental problems, which i could not, nor dare share with a professional.  i seen in my mind scenes which did not make any sense. there nights i would go outside in the yard away from my wife, and cry like a baby.  i had nightsweats for years, until it all began to make some sense, roughly 30 years after the fact.  let me attempt to explain.

when the saucer turned it light on, nothing seemed to change for me.  i remembered nothing, and yetd, something happened i cannot explain. in a dream some few weeks later, i remeber seeing a "room" with the brighness of stainless steel, which appeared to be an operating room. i was standing near the table, and heard a voice say "not him!" twice. then i found myself back at the tower.  

i sat on the floor shaking my entire body, and then woke from my dream.  in the dream , i never saw any occupents, nor the one who said the statement. it freaked me out for the longest time, not knowing or understanding what was meant.  was it real, or my imagination?  i never understood.

apparently something about me was not accepted by whomever it was, that had brought me to this place.  what if i had been accepted?  would i have undergone proding and poking as other have reported?  was i aboard that vessel, or maybe a mother-ship?  i still don't know, but have wondered for more than 48 years.

while in vietnam, i came in contact with one of my former shipmates who had also been in one of the towers.  he turned out to be an alcoholic, who stayed drunk as often as he could, and admitted that he was trying to forget the incident.. he suffered some terrific nightmares, and was extremely paranoid.   

we talked some, before his guard came and got him, and left the area.  he mentioned that all of the men in stumpy point had moved out and sent to locations all over the world.  stumpy point base was apparently closed for aa while, and then reopened when the vietnam wor hit its apex, sometime around 1969.  end
==========================================================================

content.detailedDescription: Iam a cook on the river and was done for the day and went to visit with my captain as i do most every day when iam done working, my brother called and wanted a pic of the river.As i said just took a pic of the river not knowing the ufo was in it till rite after i took it as i viewed it before i sent the pic to my brother of the river when i noticed the object. i laughted when i seen it and showed captain and he began looking straight out in front of us where i just took photo and there was nothing there.It looks like a disc with a dome in the middle..The guys are now making fun of me but i say here is the pic what do you see??
content.summary: Took picture of river from boat and seen it in the picture

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw what i thought was a bird flying pretty much approximate to a jet. i love birds and thought it was odd...The jet was traveling in a northerly fashion from the east going towards north west-most likely to land at a nearby airport. the time was 5:55 pm friday, april 17, 2015 ( today-a few hours ago)-the whole thing took a few minutes. because i am a bird lover and curious, i continued looking up in the sky. i started thinking about birds interfering with planes in flight. this bird like object descended and started traveling from right to left. i had been in my car and stopped in a parking lot to see this through my windshield.
i had no storage in my phone left for video-so i could only observe.
what caught my attention was its speed-i finally realized it wasn't a bird because it was traveling faster than the plane!
i had my prescription sunglasses on so my eyes were not deceiving me! not under the influence of anything as well! 
this was in daylight during rush hour! i was in rush hour traffic here on long island-suburbia where this isn't supposed to happen!
i keep thinking military-there is a nearby marines base. drones? don't know!
anyway-the bird with wings eventually became an orb and met up with another orb encircling   it. then a short distance later " they met a group of 3/4 other orbs encircling each other-ascending and disappearing! 
end of story! i'm shocked, upset and in wonder because of this, a few hours later!
content.summary: Bird like then transitioned to orb meeting with other orbs ascending then disappearing!

content.detailedDescription: i don't remember anything after that i was terrified and lost time , did't remember how the rest of the night went. over the years i had missed hours of not remembering working thru the night, i was awake but couldn't move but no memory of anything but the feeling i wasn't alone.
content.summary: I had left losangeles, ca my home and was reporting to fort hood, texas for duty i observed white lights flying across my windshield from north to seextreamly fast and i looked to my right side passenger window and saw a huge circular object just hooverin

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being filed as a placeholder for a current investigation.
craig lang learned about this event from a mutual friend, and then contacted and interviewed the witness.

sighting occurred in maplewood, mn on april 15th, 2015 at 10:02 pm.

object was observed moving from e to w.
at 30 degrees elevation, object abruptly turned northward.
witness briefly lost sight of object behind neighbor's roof.
witness moved a few feet north and regained view of object.

object moved rapidly north, then began a zigzagging motion, shooting to ese at high rate of speed. 
witness states that object disappeared into clouds

(note: cloud ceiling was approximately 12000 ft)


details including witness info, will be found in the full investigation report.
content.summary: Multicolored oval object appearing from east, rapid maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: Three triangles red and orange moving fast i ran in the house to get my son and then all we saw a red ball with three orange lights going and gone, that was the most beautiful side that i saw. what was that ??? don'tknow????
content.summary: Beautiful view

content.detailedDescription:
On april 15, 2015 i was traveling in my car with my boyfriend in williamson county, tn near the cool springs area. after turning from moores lane onto concord rd traveling n/nw we both observed a gradient grey (dark grey to light grey) triangular craft hovering very low over the tree line.  at first we thought it might be an airplane but both noticed it wasn't actually going anywhere. the craft had a light/lights at each corner that were bright, didn't pulsate or blink, but appeared to change from white to yellowish to a bluish color. the craft appeared to be stationary for 20-30 seconds over the trees, not traveling at an angle and wasn't moving in any direction. suddenly, the craft shot at about a 45 degree angle up and to the left (one straight line). the second before it moved, the whole craft flipped onto its side and the lights were facing us. it traveled the length of two football fields in the blink of an eye. it hovered at its new location for about 10 seconds and disappeared. 

while this was happening we were both watching it but not really talking about what we were seeing. we were both calm, didn't feel alarmed, but i remember thinking that a plane that close to the ground in a residential area was dangerous and wondering if the storm rolling in made it fly lower. it was until it flipped from perpendicular to the ground to sideways perpendicular to us and shot upward so fast that he and i questioned each other as to what we were looking at. we still were calm but somewhat nervously laughing that "um, exactly what did that thing just do and did you see that?!" by the time we asked each other it was gone.

the most pronounced fact about this is how clearly we could see it. i could likely draw it. it was not an airplane. the gradience of the color was....Odd. and the speed with which it traveled, flipped and then stopped in mid air defied anything we had ever seen and the lights quite bright. 

there was a large and rather violent storm moving into the area and the craft was not in the storm but far enough between us and the storm line (storm was at least 4 miles away in the nolensville rd/lenox village area) where the clouds provided a perfect backdrop to see it. it was too close to us to have flown into any cloud cover because the cloud line consisted of large cumulonimbus off into the distance and clear skies where the craft was. we had a clear view of the sky and did not see the direction in which it disappeared. we didn't lose sight of it in the trees or at any time...It just vanished. we drove around looking for it but couldn't locate it after it disappeared. it was never higher than a 50-75 story building. afterward we didn't even really talk about it...Just went about our way, which now that i write this, seems very odd.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular lit craft shot into sky after hovering low over residential area

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Object appeared north and remained stationary for over an hour. second object appeared as i came closer to yuma. objects could be seen with polarized sunglasses much clearer. object are still stationary, to north and north east of yuma as i write this. low object is about 10 degrees up, second object is aprox. 50 miles east and aprox 30 degrees up.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was participating at a conference in san antonio, texas. she had dinner at the revolving restaurant (well known) and took a picture of it.  when she later looked at the picture, the ufo like object was seen . she doesn't believe it could be street lights because it is too high which seems to be the case due to the height of the restaurant.
content.summary: Took picture of rotating restaurant in san antonio and saw what appears to be a ufo in the picture

content.detailedDescription: I was in between the ages of 10& 13 was old enough to compare a plane from a blimp/ the only ufos i had ever seen where from movies like et & old fictional movies from the 50's it was a summer afternoon sunset was just minutes away, when ibwas sitting in my living room watching tv when something caught my attention from the corner of my eye i saw out my window a glowing round shape object, first thing that came to mind was the sun,when i quickly realized the time...So i looked out the window & was frightened of what i was looking @ my apartment was on the second floor it felt like it was floating pass my window just over the tree line, i quickly told my mom & sisters we ran out the apartment went to the back balcony & witnessed a flying 'saucer' with its beautiful glow all around it, neighbors came out, my mind was trying to compare it to something explainable ,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Classic ufo shape no noise glowing material as if radiation. multiple witnesses one piece dome on top

content.detailedDescription: went out on front porch to smoke like i do every night. i noticed this bright flash to the south of me i looked and looked then i saw this like star it was brighter then ever before seen as i watched it started moving to the east then north that's when i seen the smaller one moving with it. it would follow for a bit then the bigger one would stop the small one would circle the big one the big one would move from side to side east then west while moving north it would stop over different spots and then move finally stopping over 9 mile nuclear power plant it stayed there for a minute or two then shot straight up out of sight. while this was going on there was what seemed to be a drone flying around almost like to was checking them out sure it was not a fighter jet it made very little noise.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just bright lights moving in nights sky then hovering over 9 mile power plant then shooting straight up out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I'm a photographer and was doing a general shoot of the city of syracuse from the roof of a parking garage on state st downtown. i never noticed this until today when i was editing pictures from that day. i did'nt want to mark the picture at all but you can see it by zooming in to the lower left part of the sky
content.summary: Did'nt see it till editing photo

content.detailedDescription: On my deck around 945pm smoking,looking up. saw 2 objects, 1 bigger, a smaller light following. so high up, appeared like star size. very fast, in a straight line, north to south. minutes later, the jets from oak harbor naval air station were in the air. the objects were long gone, very fast.
content.summary: 1object following other, straight line, very fast, high in sky, jets scrambled up from naval air, oak harbor

content.detailedDescription: This evening my sister went to dinner at a hotel with her fianc. after dinner they went outside to see the fountain lighting show and according to her was a bit cold and they were about the only people outside, there were no objects or any treats or bushes nearby. she took a few pic's to send to us in cape town and only discovered the next morning when she wanted to send the pic's the strange object on the images. she said they did not hear anything and there were no planes/helicopters at that time which was about 9hr the evening.
content.summary: Images on pics

content.detailedDescription: Observing moonrise 6th march-2015- facing easton  my building  balcony-nothing noticeable other than  how  bright the moon was-but on playback noticed a  bright  orange light that would appear and then disappear-i though  it was odd that it would show up  in  playback and  not be visible while filming. i  have  included an  unaltered frame from the  original  video. i  have  included an approximate shape of the object. no  nav lights  visible--no white  light as typical  of an aircraft-.Please note-i  have been a student  pilot-and am  familiar  with  aircraft  lights-and  my  parents are retired  pilots-i  have been around aircraft since i was 5
content.summary: Orb of  light viewed after filminmg  moonrise

content.detailedDescription:
Just having cigarette before bed looking up at stars when i saw 3 lights in triangle shape moving very fast from south to north seemed very high no noise no blinking
 nothing like ive ever seen before exept on tv i watch airplane and even fighter jets goin to andfrom local base here but they always go east to west and have very clear lights and sound this was nothing like that no time to take photo or even alert wife
content.summary: 3 lights triangle shape very very fast no sound very high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I went into shopping mall at wilton cork city , bought biscuits and water and went outside to sit and enjoy them. i was facing cork city  which would have been west of me while sitting on seat. i took a bite of biscuit and then i lifted the water to my mouth and when i tilted my head back to drink  i spotted 2 lights in the sky.  the lights were about 5 inches appart in the sky  , the one on the left  a little below the one on the right.  then they start to move closer to each other and also did slight circular motions and moved apart a few times all the time fairly close to each other.  a man passed behind me and i turned to him   and said ;can you see the lights in the sky; and when i looked back they were turned out.  he passed on  and i once again turned to scan the area in the sky and over a period of about 20 seconds they appeared again , roughly in the same area  by  blinking on and off.  i think they came on again 3 or 4 times again in slightly the same place.  they were slightly to my left  . after 3 minutes or so a jet or plane with a trail out of it passed from west to east over the area  and when it went over my head i sat there and  4 minutes ,it , or another one passed back  west to east at a fierce pace and that was all of it. i am having experiences since 5 years old  and can assure you that  jesus is god and lord  and as the bible says :no weapon formed against god will prosper: look what happened jesus and yet i know that he lives. i have been shot at and it,s a miracle escape i had.These entities are either obedient  or disobedient to the lord and  i wouldnt like to be the one who is dissobedient to him  as , as, the bible says he and his followers are the winners in the end so if i was you i wouold get born again and saved , its the moest important thing to do as i secures your eternity , in jesus precious name  amen. [name removed/cms/tg]   17  04  2015  friday thank you.
content.summary: Saw 2starlike objects a little apart, they moved around(circular motion),  dissapeared  then appeared on and off 2 or 3 times at different  points

content.detailedDescription: 13 sides. very jagged edges. some sides different. all black
content.summary: I found it on google earth. and i took screenshots. amazing

content.detailedDescription: This is a cry for help....Ive been being abducted for a couple years now probley more then i know....Ive seen two being up close and personal..My wife is very pregnant and now that shes 9 months we been having a lot of activity and im very worried....We don't have the money for night vision cameras and other equipment to capture something....I have many accounts i can go over in detail with u personally....We need help to figure out what is going on...I am willing to get hypnotized to get the whole story cause i only remember the beginning of when the take me....And i fear its getting really intense cause ive been screaming in my sleep for the last month now and i have never done anything like this in my whole life...Screaming "no" and "help me" ....And paranormal things have been getting more intense....Again if u contact me personally i will tell u everything....Thank u for your time and plz help
content.summary: Being abducted

content.detailedDescription: It came from the west. as bright as what looks like the space station. flew over city right over east saskatoon thennotced a colored smaller blinking object following it. the leading object was bright white solid and following object was red blue white and yellow blinking. very small.
content.summary: Came from west thought it was sputnic. then came above us had something following.

content.detailedDescription: My brother in law were standing in my driveway at about 10:20pm 4-15-15 talking when i leaned up against my car and looked up at the stars. i noticed what appeared to be maybe a satellite in space and told him to look. we watched it until it was no longer visible. at that point my brother in law said what is that and pointed. it was an object less than 2,000 ft. triangular in shape with no lights greyish in color and completely silent. it was traveling in a straight line south to north. it was followed by another one exactly the same approximately 3-4 seconds later. it was the strangest thing i have ever seen
content.summary: The two of us observed  two objects triangular in shape with no lights or sound traveling north at a fairly low speed less than 2000ft in sky. they were dark grey and one was following the other

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke and happened to look up at a magpie in the tree above me, i saw what looked like a star at first but noticed it was moving. so i went out on front patio to get a better look because i thought i saw a smaller light following it. and there were 2 lights, a bright star sized one and a smaller one that looked like a jet but with no blinking lights. i called my wife to come and check it out and she saw it immediately because of how they were both moving at the exact same speed in a strait line. we watched it until they both just instantly disappeared. my wife was saying did you see that, they both just vanished. i said ya, that was awesome. no vapour trial, no sound, and it was a calm and quiet and cool night. there should have been something. i came in right away and started to see if maybe it was a satellite or something that someone else has seen before. there were others on earlier dates that described the exact same thing. so now i am here telling you what we saw. we are not nuts, we both saw the same things at the same time. i work for shell as an instrumentation mechanic and my wife is a nurse and instructor for the u of l.
content.summary: Saw bright white light being followed by smaller orageish light at same speed from west sky to east by south east sky
